last_episode_to_air.name: Movie Night
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mary shares the perfect recipes for movie night, including everything sweet and salty, from savoury snacks to popcorn.

name: Mary Makes It Easy
overview: Join Mary Berg as she takes it step by step through recipes guaranteed to impress without the stress.

episodes.name: What Are Ya, Chicken?
episodes.overview: Mary offers four exciting ways to expand your chicken repertoire so it will never be boring or dry again!

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.overview: Mary settles your nerves for date night by serving up four recipes sure to impress your special guest while you maintain your chill.

episodes.name: One Pot Wonders
episodes.overview: Mary makes clean-up a breeze by whipping up four one-pot recipes that will leave you wondering, where the heck is the mess?

episodes.name: Feelin' France-y
episodes.overview: Mary gives a quick crash course in French cuisine.

episodes.name: Love Letter to Leftovers
episodes.overview: Leftovers can seem uninspiring, but Mary gives them new life by showing how to use them as ingredients in brand new recipes.

episodes.name: Cheese Please
episodes.overview: If cheese was a food group, it would be Mary's favorite; Mary pays homage to fromage with four recipes where cheese is the star.

episodes.name: Meatless Mondays
episodes.overview: Not every meal needs to have meat as the star. Mary shows how simple and delicious Meatless Mondays can be.

episodes.name: Fast Food Fixes
episodes.overview: Mary's delivering fast food flavors at home with dishes that are simple to make.

episodes.name: Let Them Eat Cake
episodes.overview: Mary has three foolproof cake recipes to make sure any celebration is a hit.

episodes.name: Freezer Fixes
episodes.overview: Mary makes the freezer a friend by throwing together four recipes with frozen ingredient staples.

episodes.name: Easy Baked Breakfast
episodes.overview: Mary shows how embracing your oven and baking for breakfast is the ultimate game changer to switch up your daily grind.

episodes.name: Mary Makes It Merry
episodes.overview: Preparing a big holiday feast can be overwhelming, but Mary has recipes to help decrease stress and give one more time to spend with family.

episodes.name: Healthied Up
episodes.overview: Mary makes healthier versions of her favorite comfort foods by incorporating more nutrients and adding healthier ingredients without sacrificing the flavor.

episodes.name: Mary Bakes It Easy
episodes.overview: Baking may be a science, but it doesn't need to be complicated; Mary's recipes show some simple solutions for enjoying baked goods at home.

episodes.name: Pasta La Vista
episodes.overview: Mary will have you saying Grazie! with four deliziosa pasta recipes that keep it simple but amp up the flavour.

episodes.name: Pie in the Sky
episodes.overview: Pie making can be daunting, but Mary provides a pastry crash course with three different types of dough.

episodes.name: Desk Lunch
episodes.overview: Mary shares recipes that help people working from home or in an office have a tasty lunch without sacrificing convenience.

episodes.name: May Contain
episodes.overview: Mary shows how to cater to food intolerances and allergies by amping up the flavour instead of using ingredient substitutions.

episodes.name: Spice, Spice, Baby
episodes.overview: Mary takes a spice-fueled adventure around the world and helps you navigate the grocery store spice aisle.

episodes.name: Picky Eaters
episodes.overview: Whether you're cooking for finicky friends or tricky tots, Mary's got it covered with strategies to feed even the pickiest eaters in your life.

episodes.name: Guests to Impress
episodes.overview: Mary recommends a retro theme for impressing guests; these old-school recipes with a special Mary twist are sure to bring fun to the table.

episodes.name: BBQ's and A's
episodes.overview: Mary brings recipes and guides to grill for novices.

episodes.name: Tastes of Tuscany
episodes.overview: Mary Berg takes it step by step through recipes guaranteed to impress without the stress.

episodes.name: Mash Up Recipes
episodes.overview: Get the best of both worlds when Mary mashes ideas together to get wacky dishes like Caesar Salad Roast Chicken and Taco Meatball Skillet.

episodes.name: Mare of Cheesetown
episodes.overview: Cheese is on the short list of Mary’s true loves, so it’s time for another round of all- cheese-everything! App, mains, and dessert, oh my.

episodes.name: Some Like It Hot
episodes.overview: Hot sauce hive unite! Mary spices it up with recipes that bring the heat, including Maple Sriracha Salmon and spicy pickled Caesar Beans.

episodes.name: Meat Cute
episodes.overview: Mary uses easier-on-your-wallet meat cuts to make flavourful dishes, like Pork Chops au Poivre and her mom’s signature Grilled Flank Steak.

episodes.name: The Plot Chickens
episodes.overview: The humble chicken is here to stay! Mary keeps it fresh with new recipes for her most- asked-for protein, and simplifies its daunting carve.

episodes.name: Curd's The Word
episodes.overview: Bean curd, that is! AKA tofu. AKA the most common meat-sub for the veg-heads out there. There’s nothing common about Mary’s takes on tofu.

episodes.name: Throwback Desserts
episodes.overview: Mary pays tribute to desserts that stand the test of time and have a nod to nostalgia in every bite, from Banoffee Pie to Icebox Cake.

episodes.name: Relay Smart Cooking
episodes.overview: A kitchen relay is Mary’s antidote to monotonous meal prep. Mary’s double-duty prep tips save future-you on oodles of cooking time.

episodes.name: Braising the Stakes
episodes.overview: Mary’s tender braising recipes feel like kitchen magic, like Braised Blade Steak and Butter Beans, or Braised Cabbage with Crispy Topping.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Party
episodes.overview: Last minute guests equals no time to freak out and cancel, and Mary’s minimal effort menu will impress in a flash.

episodes.name: Life is a Fryway
episodes.overview: Mary Berg takes viewers step-by-step through recipes that solve everyday cooking conundrums.

episodes.name: Casserole With It
episodes.overview: Nothing says comfort food like casserole, and Mary’s got a variation for any time of the day, even breakfast and dessert!

episodes.name: Soup's On!
episodes.overview: Mary. Loves. Soup. Join the soup obsession with recipes that vary from cozy to chill, smooth or chunky, plus an ample dose of cheese, duh.

episodes.name: When You Fish Upon a Star
episodes.overview: Mary helps you master the catch of the day with recipes focused around fish, including zesty Tuna Tartare and curried Salmon en Papillote.

episodes.name: Steak House Sides
episodes.overview: Mary prepares indulgent side dishes that stand out next to a steak, like Shrimp Scampi Stuffed Potato, or Stuffed Mushrooms two ways.

episodes.name: Sneak Attack
episodes.overview: Give yourself a nutritional sneak attack with Mary’s recipes that cram in the good stuff without skimping on flavour.

episodes.name: Doughn't Go Bakin' My Heart
episodes.overview: Mary would live on bread if she could, and these straightforward bread recipes make it pretty darn close.

episodes.name: Whatever Ails Ya
episodes.overview: Mary showcases her go-to recipes for when you’re not feeling 100%, whether ailing from a tummy- or heart-ache. Her Ginger Cinnamon Smoothie can help replenish some nutrients after a stomach upset.

episodes.name: Toot, Toot. We're Going to Beantown!
episodes.overview: When it comes to versatility, beans slap! Board the bean train with recipes like Black Bean Brownies or Linguini with White Bean Cream Sauce

episodes.name: Sandwich Bored
episodes.overview: Never get bored by a ammy again with Mary’s stacked recipe lineup of sandwich possibilities, like Classic Muffuletta or Turkey Patty Melts.

episodes.name: Pub Crawlers
episodes.overview: Mary makes her favourite bar bites at home like Antojitos, Beer Battered Cheese Curds, and Crispy Baked Chicken Wings.

episodes.name: Veggin’ Out on the Grill
episodes.overview: Mary is living the grill life veg-first with enticing vegetarian recipes like her Pulled Mushroom Sandwich or Grilled Halloumi Salad.

episodes.name: Movie Night
episodes.overview: Mary shares the perfect recipes for movie night, including everything sweet and salty, from savoury snacks to popcorn.
